title: I made teemo in 3D for an hd Background :p
body: I made teemo standing on a shroom enjoy :D

replies.body: You made some pretty big design errors. First and foremost he's alive.

No! Noooooooo! That is **NOT** ok!
You should not draw something like that! Please, for you own sake don't use that as your desktop background.

(Nevertheless, good job!)
I wonder how long he's actually going to look like that. I feel like he's going to be changed drastically when they update him. Bigger ears etc.

1: You forgot his evil horns.
2: You forgot his tail!
3: You forgot dead bodies!!
4: YOU FORGOT TO CALL IT THE DEVIL!!!
5: YOU  FORGOT TO ADD FIRE ALL AROUND HIM!!!!
(Good job though xD)
Lol thanks
smoke weed everyday

One day you're going to be scrolling over your icons, and suddenly there's a purple poof of dust. You'll realize then Teemo planted a mushroom there. You'll panic and move yoru cursor away, only to see it again. BLAM! 

Suddenly your computer is lagging, you have no idea why you did that. You start twitching the mouse trying to regain control, but then it's too late. That last poof lifts, and you're forced to watch in horror as your computer crashes, only to give you that all too familiar "YOU HAVE BEEN SLAIN!" Announcement, followed by an icon of your computer being slain by Teemo.

I hope you're proud of yourself. That devil will ruin your life. Better stock up on some oracle potion.
What program did you use?
Blender 3D

>
> Blender 3D

How much does it cost and where could I get it? O:
lol bro its free ...search blender 3d
blender 3d
its terrifyingly cute
Thanks  ;D
First, thought it was Minecraft. Good job tho.
3...2...1... Aaaaaaaand there's the Karthus ult. Aaaaaaaand he's dead. Good riddance.
pretty cool. {{champion:17}}
Where are his horns? And tail?

soooooo?
do you like drawing the devil!?!
nice
